entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
